PROJECT(libogg)

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.6)

IF(COMMAND cmake_policy)
	CMAKE_POLICY(SET CMP0003 NEW)
ENDIF(COMMAND cmake_policy)

SET(LIBOGG_MAJOR_VERSION 1)
SET(LIBOGG_MINOR_VERSION 3)
SET(LIBOGG_PATCH_VERSION 0)
SET(LIBOGG_VERSION ${LIBOGG_MAJOR_VERSION}.${LIBOGG_MINOR_VERSION}.${LIBOGG_PATCH_VERSION})

OPTION(KLAYGE_WITH_WINRT "WinRT support." FALSE)

SET(LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR "${CMAKE_HOME_DIRECTORY}/../..")

INCLUDE(${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/../../cmake/Common.cmake)
INCLUDE(${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/../../cmake/Platform.cmake)
INCLUDE(${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/../../cmake/Compiler.cmake)

SET_PROPERTY(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

SET(LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR "${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/lib/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")


# The project settings

SET(LIB_NAME ogg)

SET(LIBOGG_SOURCE_FILES
	${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/src/bitwise.c
	${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/src/framing.c
)
SET(LIBOGG_HEADER_FILES
	${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/include/ogg/ogg.h
	${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/include/ogg/os_types.h
)
SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files" FILES ${LIBOGG_SOURCE_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files" FILES ${LIBOGG_HEADER_FILES})

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DLIBOGG_EXPORTS)
IF(KLAYGE_WITH_WINRT)
	ADD_DEFINITIONS(-ZW)
	SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER})
	SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(${LIBOGG_SOURCE_FILES} PROPERTIES LANGUAGE CXX)
ENDIF()

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/include)
ADD_LIBRARY(${LIB_NAME} STATIC
	${LIBOGG_SOURCE_FILES} ${LIBOGG_HEADER_FILES}
)

IF(MSVC)
	SET(LIB_OUTPUT_NAME "lib${LIB_NAME}_static")
ELSE()
	SET(LIB_OUTPUT_NAME ${LIB_NAME}_static)
ENDIF()

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${LIB_NAME} PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	PROJECT_LABEL ${LIB_NAME}
	DEBUG_POSTFIX ${CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX}
	OUTPUT_NAME ${LIB_OUTPUT_NAME}
)
IF(KLAYGE_WITH_WINRT)
	SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${LIB_NAME} PROPERTIES VS_WINRT_EXTENSIONS TRUE)
ENDIF()

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${LIB_NAME})
